channel.title: The LDub Experience
channel.description:
The LDub Experience is more than a podcast; it's a sound experience featuring the best in house, drum & bass, afro beat, bossa nova, acid jazz and more.
Sit back, relax, get hype, sing, dance where ever the music takes you let's go!
Leave comments, become a fan, share the podcast with others and make suggestions of artists you think should be included in the LDub Experience.
You can also check me out on my blog itsgoldenlady.blogspot.com
Thanks for listening! Golden Lady
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Experience Starts Now!
channel.itunes:author: Golden Lady

item.title: The LDub Experience Episode 21: Reason For The Season
item.description: Hello World! Here's a mix you're sure to enjoy a little old and new school holiday cheer. All the best to you and yours and have a Golden new year!
item.dc:creator: Golden Lady
item.itunes:summary: Hello World! Here's a mix you're sure to enjoy a little old and new school holiday cheer. All the best to you and yours and have a Golden new year!

item.title: The LDub Experience Episode 20: Spaces & Places
item.description: Hello world! It's been a while but I'm back with a new mix with tracks by Black Coffee, Marc Mac and more. A little over a yr since my move to LA (time flies!) so far, LA has taught me to create spaces & places to keep me grounded and full of creativity. What space & place are you in? Marinate on that while you enjoy this mix. Thx! 1. Marc Mac- The Dreamer 2. Black Coffee- JuJu 3. Bukola- Hypnotised 4. Four to the Floor- Nganga Speaks (Koulz Naked Mix) 5. Osunlade- Ser Al Santisimo 6. The Realm Ft. Choklate- I'll Let It
item.dc:creator: Golden Lady

item.title: The LDub Experiene Episode 19: L.O.S
item.description: Hello World! On this day we tend to think of receiving love (or tokens of love) from others. This mix is about loving the most important person in your life-You! Enjoy. L.O.S- Love Of Self 1. Moodorama-Nova Star 2. Fresh Moods- You Gone 3. Malena- No Me Digas Nada 4. Incognito- Love, Joy, Understanding (Tortured Soul Remix) 5. Bebel Gilberto- River Song 6. Peter Hadar- Sweat 7. Bassfort- The Street Is My World Posted by Golden Lady at 3:05 PM
item.dc:creator: Golden Lady
item.itunes:summary:
Hello World! On this day we tend to think of receiving love (or tokens of love) from others. This mix is about loving the most important person in your life-You! Enjoy. L.O.S- Love Of Self

item.title: The LDub Experience Episode 18: Round 2
item.description: Hello World! As promised here's Round 2 for this mix I put a nice blend of house and lounge in the ring. Continue to bob and weave y'all. Enjoy! Mix Listing: 1. Studio Apartment ft.Monique Bingham-Flight (Nulife Vocal Mix) 2. Rio Orchestra- Salsa Del Rio 3. DJ Le Roi ft. Lady Bird- So Astounded 4. John Beltran- Starlight Memories 5. Bstc ft. JL- Love It 6. Cloud- Winter Nights 7. Black Coffee- Superman (Main Mix)
item.dc:creator: Golden Lady

item.title: The LDub Experience Episode 17: Round 1
item.description: Hello World! First mix of 2011 very excited to bring you a massive mix of Drum & Bass. It's dark, it's gritty, it's melodic, it's Round 1 reflective of my first few months in LA. LOL Round 2 coming soon. Enjoy! Mix Listing 1. Tantrum Desire- A Legend Will Rise 2. Drumsound & Bassline Smith- Welcome to the Jungle 3. Pendulum- Water Colour 4. Jakes- Warface 5. Tantrum Desire-Dark Waters 6. Fresh-Talkbox 7. DJ Die & Interface Ft. William Cartwright- Bright Lights 8. Phil Tangent- Billie's Smiles 9. Art Official Intelligence- 3's A Crowd 10. Total Science- Redlines 11. Edward Oberon- Loveline

item.title: The LDub Experience Episode 16: Voyager Golden Part 2
item.description: Voyager Golden Pt. 2 dedicated to the homies and fam who helped make my move to Cali possible. Mix Listing: 1. 3-11 Porter- Surround me with your love 2. Sirus- Big Ben 3. Kylie Minogue- Chocolate 4. Nuspirit Helsinki- It's Alright 5. George Loops- A Little Mole Hole 6. Arsenal- A Volta

item.title: The LDub Experience Episode 16: Voyager Golden Part 1
item.description: Hello World! I know it's been a while since the last mix but for good reason. I decided to step out on faith and move to California!! It's been a voyage indeed Mix # 1 explains it best. lol Mix #2 is dedicated to my friends/family who in their own way helped make the move possible (I couldn't have done it with out you). Lots of great things will be coming out of TLDE camp so stay tuned. Enjoy! Golden Mix Listing: 1. Ron Trent-We Lift Our Hands in the Sanctuary 2. Armand Van Helden- Hey Baby 3. Nick Holder- Inside Your Soul (Jamie Anderson Remix) 4. Miguel Migs- Moving On 5. Kings of Tomorrow- Sunshine
item.dc:creator: Golden Lady
item.itunes:summary:

Lots of great things will be coming out of TLDE camp so stay tuned. Enjoy! Golden
Mix Listing: 1. Ron Trent-We Lift Our Hands in the Sanctuary 2. Armand Van Helden- Hey Baby 3. Nick Holder- Inside Your Soul (Jamie Anderson Remix) 4. Miguel Migs- Moving On 5. Kings of Tomorrow- Sunshine

item.title: The LDub Experience Episode 15: State of Flux
item.description: Noun 1. state of flux - a state of uncertainty about what should be done (usually following some important event) preceding the establishment of a new direction or action. Hello World! We've all been in a state of flux, this mix represents the space in between. The space between uncertainty and possibilty, despair and rebirth, not knowing the outcome but knowing it's gonna be ok. Vibe out and let me know what you think. Enjoy! Mix Listing: 1. Lamb-Transfatty Acid(Kruder & Dorfmeister) 2. Soulrider- Summeresque 3. Praful-Says Kabir orginal mix 4. Koop-Summer Sun (Markus Enochson mix) 5. Koop ft. Terry Callier- In a Hearbeat 6. Gaelle- Fallin 7. Minus 8- White(new vocal version) 8. Motorcyle- As the rush comes in 9. Dntel- Anywhere anyone 10. Alpha-Sometime later

item.title: The LDub Experience Episode 14: Rejoice
item.description: Hello World! This mix is strictly for the dance floor so get ready to groove. No wall flowers here! It's time to celebrate our blessings and rejoice. Mix listing: 1. Praful-Says Kabir (Kareem Raihani remix) 2. Osunlade- Tarzan (Yoruba Soul mix) 3. Robbie Rivera-Feel This 4. Late Night Alumni- Finally Found (Max Vangeli remix) 5. Kaskade & Deadmau5- I remember (Caspa remix) 6. Domu- Taking flight 7. Atjazz- Strike Enjoy!
item.dc:creator: Golden Lady
item.itunes:summary:

Enjoy!

item.title: The LDub Experience Episode 13: Let's Ride
item.description: Hello World! Lucky #13 is here! This is the kind of mix you groove to take a ride to. Thanks for your continued support of The LDub Experience and my blog, itsgoldenlady.blogspot.com if you haven't seen it check it out and join the fun! This mix is dedicated to one of my favorite MC's Guru (Keith Elam). Gone too soon but never forgotten. Mix List: 1. Sunliner-P76 2. The Rurals-Rebel 3. The Wamadue Project-Remembering the Memory 4. Lisa Shaw-Find the way 5. Ian Pooley- Coraco Tambor 6. Thievery Corporation- Illumination 7. Shirley Horn-Return to Paradise (Verve Remix)
item.dc:creator: Golden Lady
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: The LDub Experience Episode 12: Wake Up Call
item.description: Hello World! I bringing you more jungle/dnb in Episode 12: Wake Up Call. Groove with tracks from Blame, 4Hero, Seba, and LTJ Bukem. This is definately one of my favorite episodes hope you enjoy it as well. Comments are a good thing so leave some I'd luv to hear from you! Enjoy! Track Listing: 1. Blame-Universal Music 2. 4Hero-Parallel Universe 3. Artificial Intelligence-Thirsty 4. Seba ft. Paradox- Wake Up Call 5. Danny Byrd- Feet Won't Touch the Ground 6. LTJ Bukem- Coolin Out 7. Seba- As long as it takes
item.dc:creator: Golden Lady

item.title: The LDub Experience Episode 11: Now or Never
item.description: Hello World! Episode 11 features tracks by Afronaught, Minus 8, Chuck Love,Sergio Mendes and a few of my other favs. Now or never, you know what it means apply it where necessary. Enjoy!
item.dc:creator: Golden Lady
item.itunes:summary: Hello World! Episode 11 features tracks by Afronaught, Minus 8, Chuck Love,Sergio Mendes and a few of my other favs. Now or never, you know what it means apply it where necessary. Enjoy!

item.title: The LDub Experience Episode 10: Shine
item.description: Hello World! Epiosde #10 is here and ready to rock you with tracks from Max Vangeli, Kim English, Kyoto Jazz Massive and more. Thanks for your continued support of the show. Enjoy and let your light shine!
item.dc:creator: Golden Lady
item.itunes:summary: Hello World! Epiosde #10 is here and ready to rock you with tracks from Max Vangeli, Kim English, Kyoto Jazz Massive and more. Thanks for your continued support of the show. Enjoy and let your light shine!

item.title: The LDub Experience Episode 9: I Gotchu
item.description: Hello World! This mix features tracks by Koop, DJ Smash, The Cinematic Orchestra and my peoples Maf Maddix and Everything is Temporary. Big ups to my peeps for supplying tracks! This ep is all about discovering your sound track and knowing whatever it is I Gotchu. Enjoy!
item.dc:creator: Golden Lady
item.itunes:summary: Hello World! This mix features tracks by Koop, DJ Smash, The Cinematic Orchestra and my peoples Maf Maddix and Everything is Temporary. Big ups to my peeps for supplying tracks! This ep is all about discovering your sound track and knowing whatever it is I Gotchu. Enjoy!

item.title: The LDub Experience Episode 8: Coming in Good (DnB Style)
item.description: Hello World! Happy New Year! As promised, the 1st episode of 2010 is ALL Drum & Bass. I'm coming in good with tracks from Future Prophecies, Gridlok, Danny Byrd, DJ Hype, Evol Intent, Commix and more. Warning: You may need protective gear when listening.
